results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እስከሚቀሰቀሱበት ቀን ድረስ በሆዱ ውስጥ በቆየ ነበር፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: እርሱ በሽተኛ ሆኖ በቃይ በሌለው (በባሕር) ዳርቻ ላይ ጣልነውም፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: በእርሱም ላይ (በአጠገቡ) ከቅል የሆነችን ዛፍ አበቀልን፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ወደ መቶ ሺሕ ሰዎችም (ዳግመኛ) ላክነው፡፡ ከቶውንም ይጨምራሉ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
